title: Shimmering Glasskite

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Generate (Blue) each night.
- (1): Attack a player each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Each night, a random non-Gatherer ability that targets you will fail.

desc:
Post 1896
*A child’s whisper could crack its shell, but not even an oni’s scream could penetrate it.*
